EmailTemplate.name: Trial Onboarding - Experienced vs Inexperienced - GTM-1296.ACQ - Experienced - D
EmailTemplate.subject: Need assistance? Get answers in our Resource Center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Visit our Resource Center to find everything you need to know to build your store. Call 1-844-632-8912 for assistance on selecting a BigCommerce plan today. Log in to your control panel <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+2+Email+3&utm_content=Control+Panel]]> Quickly build your store Visit our Resource Center <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/resource-center/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+2+Email+3&utm_content=Resource+Center]]> <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/University/Quick-Tour-of-Bigcommerce-Video]]> We have many resources available to help you build and optimize your store, run your business more efficiently, enhance your marketing, and more. Our Resource Center <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/resource-center/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+2+Email+3&utm_content=Resource+Center]]> includes:
- Support Portal: Step-by-step tutorials guide you through setting up and using your BigCommerce store
- BigCommerce University: Our popular video series teaches you how to run a successful online business
- App Store: Add new functionality to your online store with powerful integrations and apps such as accounting, marketing, shipping and more
- Experts: Our extensive network of certified designers and developers help customize your store
- Community: Speak directly to BC staff and our friendly partners
Visit our Resource Center » <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/resource-center/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+2+Email+3&utm_content=Resource+Center]]>
